title: Fluffy gluten free chocolate chip pancakes
ingredients: ['125g gluten free flour', '1/2 teaspoon gluten free baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon cinnamon', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 egg', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '120ml cold milk, or as needed', '85g gluten free chocolate chips']
